question: Which country topped in the "All-time medal table" of the Kabaddi World Cup?
explanation: India topped in the "All-time medal table" of the Kabaddi World Cup. The Kabaddi World Cup is an indoor international Kabaddi competition conducted by the International Kabaddi Federation (IKF) in a standard style, contested by men's and women's national teams. The competition has been previously contested in 2004, 2007 and 2016. All the tournaments have been won by India.
